actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.

official_title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the United States Postal Service should take all appropriate measures to ensure the continuation of its 6-day mail delivery service.

summary.text: Urges the U.S. Postal Service to take all appropriate measures to ensure the continuation of its six-day mail delivery service.

titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the United States Postal Service should take all appropriate measures to ensure the continuation of its 6-day mail delivery service.
